Package app.model

Class PlayerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • app.model.PlayerModel
  • public class PlayerModel
extends java.util.Observable
    "PlayerModel" class represents an object of a player. The properties are: Player name, player's troop number, the color in view screen (displaying) representing the player,
    Author:
    GROUP-35
